title: iPad/iPhone News Refresh
custom_preconds:
Given an user is on an iOS Device with iOS At Bat installed

To test it would be easier to connect to Charles and filter by newsreader.json to see if calls files:

Prod - http://mlb.mlb.com/gen/content/tag/v1/mlb/news/ipad_newsreader.json
Prod - http://mlb.mlb.com/gen/content/tag/v1/mlb/news/iphone_newsreader.json

cacheLifetime set in seconds in the config (usually about 5 minutes):
https://atbatappconfig.mlb.com/ios/9.4.0/ipadOverrides.json
https://atbatappconfig.mlb.com/ios/9.4.0/iphoneOverrides.json
